summary: A singer stranded in Panama moves in with an ex-soldier and his hypochondriac roommate; she and the former fall in love, but their romance is threatened by work and the arrival of an old flame.
cast: Carole Lombard|Fred MacMurray|Charles Butterworth|Jean Dixon|Dorothy Lamour|Harvey Stephens|Cecil Cunningham|Charles Arnt|Franklin Pangborn|Anthony Quinn|Charles Judels|Martha Arcos|William Arnold|Eumenio Blanco|Lee Bowman|Spencer Chan|James Conaty|Lee Cooley|Gino Corrado|Jack Daley|Leyland Hodgson|Esther Howard|Arthur Stuart Hull|George W. Jimenez|Darby Jones|Donald Kerr|Richard Kipling|Nicholas Kobliansky|Nick Lukats|Jerry Mandy|Chris-Pin Martin|Frances Morris|Al Morro|Louis Natheaux|Paul Newlan|Dennis O'Keefe|Ralph Remley|Cyril Ring|Enrique de Rosas|Oscar Rudolph|Harry Semels|George Sorel|Charles Stevens|Frank Whitson|William Wright
title: Comenzó en el trópico
